comments: Expansion of hypergeometric function F(-1/2,1/2;1;16x).Expansion of E(m)/(pi/2) in powers of m/16=(k/4)^2, where E(m) is complete elliptic integral of second kind evaluated at m. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 04 2003
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 591.
J. M. Borwein and P. B. Borwein, Pi and the AGM, Wiley, 1987, p. 8.
links: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
author: Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org)
